creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; golden brown with black designs; lengthwise bands of rectangles with parallel lines alternating with conjoined bowtie shapes; these bands alternate with bars with scrolls on ends, decorative scroll motifs, bands with diagonal lines at ends, and scrolls with hook forms
title: Barkcloth panel
